text: Eduardo Assunção Varela (born 16 July 2000), commonly known as Dinho or Pogba, is a São Toméan footballer who plays as a midfielder for FC Porto Real and the São Tomé and Príncipe national team. ==Club career== On 13 January 2019, Dinho joined Equatorial Guinean Liga Nacional de Fútbol club Cano Sport Academy. ==International career== Dinho made his international debut for São Tomé and Príncipe in 2017. ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Association football defenders Category:São Tomé and Príncipe footballers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe international footballers Category:UDRA players Category:Cano Sport Academy players Category:São Tomé and Príncipe expatriate footballers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe expatriate sportspeople in Equatorial Guinea Category:Expatriate footballers in Equatorial Guinea
title: Dinho (footballer)
